 3/** @file    initfin.hpp
 4    @author  Zack Weinberg
 5    @date    2005-01-19
 6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: [initfin] Initialization and finalization.
 7 
 8   This file declares the mechanism for initialization and
 9   finalization of the library's private data structures.  Use of any
10   library routines while no \c vsipl object exists provokes
11   undefined behavior.  */
12
13#ifndef VSIP_INITFIN_HPP
14#define VSIP_INITFIN_HPP
15
16/***********************************************************************
17  Included Files
18***********************************************************************/
19
20#include <vsip/support.hpp>
21#include <vsip/core/counter.hpp>
22
23/***********************************************************************
24  Declarations
25***********************************************************************/
26
27/// All VSIPL++ interfaces live in namespace \c vsip.
28namespace vsip
29{
30
31namespace impl
32{
33// Forward Declaration
34class Par_service;
35namespace profile
36{
37class Profiler_options;
38} // namespace profile
39} // namespace impl
40  
41/// Class for management of library private data structures.
42///
43/// While the VSIPL++ library is in use, at least one \c vsipl
44/// object must exist.  Creation of more \c vsipl objects has
45/// no additional effect.  The library remains usable until the
46/// last vsipl object is destroyed.
47///
48/// Optionally, one may pass the program's command line arguments to
49/// the vsipl constructor; they are then scanned for
50/// implementation-defined options which modify the library's behavior.
51/// (This only happens the first time a \c vsipl object is created.)
52///
53/// vsipl objects may not be copied.
54class vsipl
55{
56public:
57  /// Constructor requesting default library behavior.
58  vsipl();
59
60  /// Constructor requesting command-line-dependent library behavior.
61  vsipl(int& argc, char**& argv);
62
63  /// Destructor.
64  ~vsipl() VSIP_NOTHROW;
65
66  static impl::Par_service* impl_par_service()
67  { return par_service_; }
68
69private:
70  // These are declared to prevent the compiler from synthesizing
71  // default definitions; they are deliberately left undefined.
72  vsipl(const vsipl&);            ///< Stub to block copy-initialization.
73  vsipl& operator=(const vsipl&); ///< Stub to block assignment.
74
75  // Internal variables:
76
77  /// Count of active \c vsipl objects.
78  static impl::Checked_counter use_count;
79
80  /// Parallel Service.
81  static impl::Par_service* par_service_;
82
83  /// Profiler.
84  static impl::profile::Profiler_options* profiler_opts_;
85
86  // Internal functions:
87private:
88
89  /// Constructor worker function.
90  static void initialize_library(int& argc, char**& argv);
91
92  /// Destructor worker function.
93  static void finalize_library();
94};
95
96} // namespace vsip
97
98#endif // initfin.hpp
